function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variable associations detected through correspondence analysis","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of associations and relationships","Mitigation":"Cross-check results with additional statistical analysis methods","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"Fluctuation in urban green space density over time","Impact":"Impact on public health due to changes in green space availability","Mitigation":"Monitoring and intervention to maintain or increase green space density","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban planning software","People":"Public health organizations, urban planners","Owner":"Government agencies"},{"Description":"Inverse relationship between population density and UGS density","Impact":"Unequal access to green spaces and potential impact on mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of green spaces, urban planning for integrated green infrastructure","Technologies":"GIS mapping, spatial analysis tools","People":"Urban residents, public health organizations","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"}]}
